item.title: Chaos Engineering
item.description: This is a small extract from a previous post regarding Patterns for a Resilient Architecture in which we reviewed good practices and design to ensure a high degree of resliency in our systems; this was too part of a session during the past AWS Loft in Stockholm on 2018.
